title: Sending activation email
description: This event ("activate-email") has to be emitted when a user signs up to send activation email.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitActivateEmail

title: Create meeting
description: This event ("create-meeting") has to be emitted while creating a meeting.It will automatically send meeting created email and meeting will also be automatically scheduled 1 minute before start of the meeting.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted
examples.content:
{
                            "adminId" : string,
                            "adminFullName" : string,
                            "adminUserName" : string,
                            "userId" : string,
                            "userFullName" : string,
                            "userEmail" : string,
                            "start" : date,
                            "end" : date,
                            "place" : string,
                            "title" : string
                        }

name: EmitCreateMeeting

title: Delete meeting
description: This event ("delete-meeting") has to be emitted while deleting a meeting.It will automatically send meeting deletion email and cancel the scheduled email.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted
examples.content:
{
                            "meetingId" : string,
                            "adminId" : string,
                            "adminFullName" : string,
                            "adminUserName" : string,
                            "userId" : string,
                            "userFullName" : string,
                            "userEmail" : string,
                            "start" : date,
                            "end" : date,
                            "place" : string,
                            "title" : string
                        }

name: EmitDeleteMeeting

title: Edit meeting
description: This event ("edit-meeting") has to be emitted while saving an edited meeting.It will automatically send meeting edited email and meeting will also be automatically rescheduled 1 minute before start of the meeting.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted
examples.content:
{
                            "meetingId" : string,
                            "adminId" : string,
                            "adminFullName" : string,
                            "adminUserName" : string,
                            "userId" : string,
                            "userFullName" : string,
                            "userEmail" : string,
                            "start" : date,
                            "end" : date,
                            "place" : string,
                            "title" : string
                        }

name: EmitEditMeeting

title: Sending change password email
description: This event ("forgot-password") has to be emitted when a user inputs his email to receive forget password email.

examples.title: The following data has to be emitted

name: EmitForgotPassword

title: Joining the current room
description: This event ("join-room") has to be emitted when admin opens the user page to check his dashboard. Data that has to be passed here is userId
name: EmitJoinRoom

title: Setting admin online
description: This event ("set-admin") has to be emitted when a admin comes online. This is to verify if the user is admin user only. The data that has to be passed is authToken.
name: EmitSetAdmin

title: Setting user online
description: This event ("set-user") has to be emitted when a user comes online. This is to verify if the user is normal user only
name: EmitSetUser

title: Emitting auth error on fail of token verification
description: This event ("auth-error") has to be listened by the current room and will be triggered if there comes any auth-token error
name: ListenAuthError

title: deleting meeting in realtime for user and admin
description: This event ("delete-meeting") has to be listened by both admin and user that will notify them in real time that meeting is deleted.
name: ListenDeleteMeeting

title: Starting the room
description: This event ("start-room") has to be listened to start any room. Only then the other events of room and meeting get to work.
name: ListenStartRoom

title: Updating meeting in realtime for user and admin
description: This event ("update-meeting") has to be listened by both admin and user that will notify them in real time that meeting is created or edited.

examples.title: The example data as output
examples.content:
{
                        error:false,
                        message : 'Meeting created',
                        status : 200,
                        data :
                            {
                                "meetingId" : string,
                                "adminId" : string,
                                "adminFullName" : string,
                                "adminUserName" : string,
                                "userId" : string,
                                "userFullName" : string,
                                "userEmail" : string,
                                "start" : date,
                                "end" : date,
                                "place" : string,
                                "title" : string
                            }
                    }

name: ListenUpdateMeeting

title: Meeting Reminder
description: This event ("userId") has to be listened by the online user that will notify them in real time that is about to start in 1 minute.

examples.title: The example data as output
examples.content:
{
                        "meetingId" : string,
                        "adminId" : string,
                        "adminFullName" : string,
                        "adminUserName" : string,
                        "userId" : string,
                        "userFullName" : string,
                        "userEmail" : string,
                        "start" : date,
                        "end" : date,
                        "place" : string,
                        "title" : string
                    }

name: ListenUserid

title: Verification of user
description: This event ("verifyUser") has to be listened on the user's end to verify user or admin authentication.
name: ListenVerifyuser
